title: Resorts World Bimini - Still Blissful After Passage of Erik
text:
MIAMI , Aug. 31, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Nothing interferes with #BiminiBliss, not even a tropical storm. Resorts World Bimini (RWB) - the exciting vacation spot on the island of Bimini in the Bahamas - was unaffected by the passage of Tropical Storm Erika which had been forecasted to impact the Bahamas , but instead veered in another direction.  While effects of the system were felt in some parts of The Bahamas , RWB was completely undamaged and remains fully operational in top condition. Guests can still find their bliss at a destination that has an unprecedented number of amenities coupled with an amazing journey that takes you there.   This fall, guests can get more of beautiful Bimini for less, as the world's first cruise destination is making it easier than ever to enjoy #BiminiBliss.   Bimini SuperFast, ferrying passengers from the Port of Miami directly to Bimini, and Resorts World Bimini are offering an incredible all-in deal. 
Here's how it works:  
Book your round trip cruise trip aboard Bimini SuperFast from Port Miami .  Reserve a deluxe four-night stay or more at the Hilton at Resorts World Bimini or book a family-style condominium stay. You'll get a $250 credit at check out! To redeem this offer, guests must book now through September 30, 2015 for stays from September 9 to December 21 , 2015.  It's that easy!  This special offer is based on double occupancy and some restrictions apply.  Blackout dates are November 21 â€“ 28, and the rebate is provided at checkout on your folio.  There is a limit of one $250 deduction per room.  The promotion is subject to change or cancellation at the discretion of management.  Passports are required for resort stay.  Guests must be 18 years of age to gamble in international waters and in The Bahamas . 
Bimini SuperFast departs from Port Miami to Resorts World Bimini, Bahamas on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. Book your getaway at www.rwbimini.com or by calling 1.888.930.8688.  
About Resorts World Bimini 
Resorts World Bimini (rwbimini.com) is nestled on the beautiful island of North Bimini, Bahamas , just 50 miles from Miami . Surrounded by white sand beaches and crystal clear turquoise waters, Resorts World Bimini is a 750 acre property featuring a variety of accommodations including condos, beachfront villas, a 300 room Hilton hotel, the largest marina in The Bahamas with 280 slips, six bars and restaurants, two pools and a world class casino. The resort features its own dedicated cruise ship, Bimini SuperFast, a 32,000-ton vessel that transports passengers back and forth between Bimini and Port Miami three days a week. Resorts World Bimini is owned by The Genting Group, ( www.genting.com ), a global company founded in 1965, operating destination resorts in Malaysia , Singapore , South Korea , the United Kingdom , the Bahamas and the United States.  Genting has more than 50 years of experience in the travel and leisure industry and collectively employs approximately 60,000 people while offering an unparalleled resort experience to over 50 million visitors a year worldwide.
